short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chess logic game where you place eight queens on a chessboard without threatening each other.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Challenge your mind with the Eight Queens Puzzle, a classic chess logic game. Place 8 queens on the board without any threatening each other. Multiple difficulty levels available.
